entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
